long_description: The Yakima DryDock Boat hitch mount readies your truck for easy transport of your canoe or kayak. Unique Y-frame design is a perfect loading platform for trucks (even trucks with camper shells), SUVs and vans. Add DryDock to a pair of towers and crossbars to create a top-of-car system for your truck; towers and crossbars not included. Tilt-down design makes loading big boats easy. Adjustable height lets you match the height of the DryDock to your roof rack. The Yakima DryDock Boat hitch mount comes in a rust-resistant, matte black powder-coated finish.
short_description: The Yakima DryDock Boat hitch mount readies your truck for easy transport of your canoe or kayak.
